weather wisdom

Hurricane Sandy to hit east coast early next week

Over the next couple days the center of the storm will stay over the ocean before curving to the west and landing in the New York, New Jersey area. (Boston.com)

State requests millions for drug lab fallout

The state's judiciary said it needs $13.6 million to deal with rising costs for up to 136,000 criminal cases in the fallout from allegedly mishandled evidence. (Boston Globe)

E. Boston women on alert after attacks

According to Boston Police data, there have been seven assaults on women in East Boston in the past three months, and the assailants remain at large. (Boston Globe)

Romney vouched in 1991 for low price of Staples stock that would soar a year later

Mitt Romney's 1991 testimony suggested that there was little indication that Staples' value would soar soon after the Staples founder and his then-wife divorced. (Globe)
